page.title: 20LIST OF CREDITS
page.content: Since the eldest class in the school is effectively p.4.,teachers,parents , minister and pupils have all been involved in compiling the information for the project.{The following pupils {were involved with their families:- Douglas Petrie ,Rachel Brockie,Abigail Safarty,Jennifer King,Katie Bridger, Louis Eames,and Fraser Bain.{Also } Lucy Levie,Mrs Judy Taylor,Mrs Thomson school cleaner & Major & Mrs Strachan. {Also pupils}Alan Duncan,Graeme Catto, and Lynn Stewart. Miss Kinniburgh the school chaplain and minister contributed.{Most of the {organisation}was done by Mrs Sandra Gibbons,assistant teacher. The {typing,editing and photos}were done by Mrs Mary Levie, head teacher,completed during the summer holiday since the Scottish holiday starts earlier than the summer English holiday.
